channel.title: Need Help getting server online so others can play! Rep++
channel.description: i need help getting my server on moparscape or silab or something so others can play ive read tutorials and everything but theres something i cant figure out thats preventing it.. if you could teamview and help me i would appreciate it much. reply to this and/or add me on skype. soulsplit.staff-magepker12 ill make whoever helps admin also.

item.title: Need Help getting server online so others can play! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Xaryza Xaryza
item.description:
@Xaryza wrote:

I’m trying to get my server online aswell,
First of all, i searched in client.java for 127.0.0.1, but with no results.
I downloaded the portforward program and it wont display my router etc.
So i really have a problem :s

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help getting server online so others can play! Rep++

item.title: Need Help getting server online so others can play! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

Follow basic steps lol.

In client .java search for

127.0.0.1

Replace with your NO-IP, host name

get this @ www.no-ip.com

repeat for client.sided but also change gui.java.

www.utorrent.com Is good for portfowarding, read Tuts if you need help.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help getting server online so others can play! Rep++

item.title: Need Help getting server online so others can play! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

You can’t even give rep.

Also, www.portforward.com

Have you portforward your router correctly?
Have you Turned off firewall?
Have you made an account and made a host on www.no-ip.com?
Have you turned on your hosts on the no-ip DUC?

Hope i helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help getting server online so others can play! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Crazyjackson78 Crazyjackson78
item.description:
@Crazyjackson78 wrote:

Have you made a no-ip host name? Have you made a static ip and enabled port forwarding on your router? Have you edited the client.java to put in your static ip that you made?

Read full topic
